programme.desc: New Zealand v England (Centre-pass 8.45am). Coverage of the first of three fixtures in the Taini Jamison Trophy, which takes place at Te Rauparaha Arena in Porirua

programme.title: Live Test Cricket
programme.sub-title: England v West Indies: Third Test Day One.
programme.desc: England v West Indies. Coverage of day one of the series-concluding Third Test at Lord's. These sides last met on this ground in the longest format of the game in May 2012, when the home side won by five wickets. A first-innings century from captain Andrew Strauss was the catalyst for that victory, despite impressive scores of 87 not out and 91 from the Windies' star batsman Shivnarine Chanderpaul

programme.title: Test Cricket: The Verdict
programme.sub-title: England v West Indies: Third Test Day One.
programme.desc: Analysis of, and reaction to, the opening day of the Third Test between England and the West Indies, which took place at Lord's

programme.title: Live EFL
programme.desc: Derby County v Hull City (Kick-off 7.45pm). Coverage of the Championship match, which takes place at Pride Park. This is the first meeting between these sides since the play-off semi-final in May 2016. The Tigers won the first leg on this ground 3-0, but were lucky to hang on after losing the second leg 2-0 at home. They would go on to clinch promotion to the Premier League with victory over Sheffield Wednesday at Wembley Stadium(n)

programme.title: Live EFL
programme.desc: Derby County v Hull City (Kick-off 7.45pm). Coverage of the Championship match, which takes place at Pride Park. This is the first meeting between these sides since the play-off semi-final in May 2016. The Tigers won the first leg on this ground 3-0, but were lucky to hang on after losing the second leg 2-0 at home. They would go on to clinch promotion to the Premier League with victory over Sheffield Wednesday at Wembley Stadium(n)

programme.title: Live Test Cricket
programme.sub-title: England v West Indies: Third Test Day One.
programme.desc: England v West Indies. Coverage of day one of the series-concluding Third Test at Lord's. These sides last met on this ground in the longest format of the game in May 2012, when the home side won by five wickets. A first-innings century from captain Andrew Strauss was the catalyst for that victory, despite impressive scores of 87 not out and 91 from the Windies' star batsman Shivnarine Chanderpaul

Kvalifikacije za SP 2018: Turčija - Hrvaška (skrajšan posnetek)
programme.desc: Boj za nastop na svetovnem prvenstvu v Rusiji se zaostruje. Odslej bo v boju za odhod na mundial pomembna vsaka točka, zato si lahko obetamo zanimive in atraktivne obračune. Kdo bo boljši na obračunu med Turčijo in Hrvaško?

programme.title: Live! Južnoameriške kvalifikacije za SP 2018: Argentina - Venezuela
programme.desc: Boj za nastop na svetovnem prvenstvu v Rusiji se zaostruje. Odslej bo v boju za odhod na mundial pomembna vsaka točka, zato si lahko obetamo zanimive in atraktivne obračune. Kdo bo boljši na obračunu med Argentino in Venezuelo?

programme.title: ATP Uncovered, 35. del
programme.desc: Teniško dogajanje je vsak teden izjemno zanimivo. Veliko je turnirjev in veliko tekem. Če ste kakšno zamudili, ne skrbite, za vas skrbi ATP s svojo tedensko oddajo

programme.title: Live! Srednjeameriške kvalifikacije za SP 2018: Kostarika - Mehika
programme.desc: Boj za nastop na svetovnem prvenstvu v Rusiji se zaostruje. Odslej bo v boju za odhod na mundial pomembna vsaka točka, zato si lahko obetamo zanimive in atraktivne obračune. Kdo bo boljši na obračunu med Kostariko in Mehiko?

programme.title: KHL: Salavat - Barys
programme.desc: S polnim imenom Kontinentalna hokejska liga za ligo NHL velja za drugo najmočnejšo hokejsko tekmovanje na svetu. Prvič so tekmovanje izvedeli leta 2008, večina sodelujočih klubov je iz Rusije, dvaindvajset, po en klub pa iz Belorusije, Latvije, Finske, Slovaške, Kazahstana in Kitajske. Naslov brani SKA iz Sankt Petersburga, ki je bil v finalu s 4:1 boljši od Metallurga iz Magnitogorska

programme.title: Kvalifikacije za SP 2018: Irska - Srbija
programme.desc: Boj za nastop na svetovnem prvenstvu v Rusiji se zaostruje. Odslej bo v boju za odhod na mundial pomembna vsaka točka, zato si lahko obetamo zanimive in atraktivne obračune. Kdo bo boljši na obračunu med Irsko in Srbijo?(c)

programme.title: Južnoameriške kvalifikacije za SP 2018: Argentina - Venezuela
programme.desc: Boj za nastop na svetovnem prvenstvu v Rusiji se zaostruje. Odslej bo v boju za odhod na mundial pomembna vsaka točka, zato si lahko obetamo zanimive in atraktivne obračune. Kdo bo boljši na obračunu med Argentino in Venezuelo?

programme.title: Slovenski pokal: Tabor Sežana - Maribor
programme.desc: Maribor pokalno tekmovanje v novi sezoni začenja v Sežani, kjer ga čaka domači Cherrybox 24 Tabor. Primorci so se letos vrnili v drugoligaško tekmovanje, kjer se želijo v začetku ustaliti, nato pa se tudi vrniti med prvogliaško elito, kjer so v preteklosti že nastopali. Vijoličasti so izraziti favoriti na papirju, vendar bodo morali to vlogo potrditi tudi na igrišču, kjer jim domači pod vodstvom Davorja Škerjanca in Naceta Kosmača ne bodo pustili dihati

programme.title: Kvalifikacije za SP 2018: Turčija - Hrvaška

programme.title: League 1: Bradford City - Bristol Rovers
programme.desc: »League One« je drugo najvišje rangirano tekmovanje v »The Football League« in tretje najvišje rangirano v angleškem nogometnem sistemu. V njej nastopa 24 moštev, ki se borijo za napredovanje v Championship. V višji rang tekmovanja neposredno napredujeta dve moštvi. Zadnjega potnika v 2. ligo dobimo po »playoffu«, v katerega se uvrstijo moštva uvrščena od 3. do 6. mesta po rednem delu

programme.title: UEFA Champions League: Magazin
programme.desc: Branilec naslova najmočnejšega klubskega nogometnega tekmovanja v Evropi je madridski Real, ki je po zmagi proti Juventusu sploh kot prvi ubranil naslov v sedanjem formatu Lige prvakov. Kdo pa bo najmočnejše evrposko klubsko tekmovanje osvojil v novi sezoni? Vse zanimivosti o najelitnejšem evropskem klubskem tekmovanju izveste v tedenskem magazinu

programme.title: KHL: Salavat - Barys
programme.desc: S polnim imenom Kontinentalna hokejska liga za ligo NHL velja za drugo najmočnejšo hokejsko tekmovanje na svetu. Prvič so tekmovanje izvedeli leta 2008, večina sodelujočih klubov je iz Rusije, dvaindvajset, po en klub pa iz Belorusije, Latvije, Finske, Slovaške, Kazahstana in Kitajske. Naslov brani SKA iz Sankt Petersburga, ki je bil v finalu s 4:1 boljši od Metallurga iz Magnitogorska

programme.title: Champions Tour Learning Center *
programme.desc: PGA TOUR Champions Rookie of the Year candidate Steve Flesch offers instruction on hitting a fairway bunker shot. programme.desc: Deer season is under way, but the guys have a chance to head south for some duck hunting action as well

programme.title: Moment of Impact

programme.title: Bowhunter TV

programme.title: Jon Baker's Guide 4 Adventure
programme.desc: Part 1. A strong heritage in central Montana. Jon Baker lives the Crow Indian tradition of the buffalo hunt

programme.title: Spook Nation *
programme.desc: Spook chases a buck he calls Praying Hands Buck, while Ohio buddies, Scott and Steve Esker, chase giant whitetail in central Ohio

programme.title: Pigman: The Series
programme.desc: Part 2. It's the time of year where Pigman invites a few lucky fans to come and hunt with him. Deer and hogs are on the docket along with a healthy dose of smack talkin' from the Pig himself. Dap joins the fun for his first Shankfest experience

programme.title: Easton Bowhunting TV
programme.desc: Fred and Michele try to finish their world slam on turkeys. Fred with his recurve and Michele with her bow

programme.title: All Things Hunting - ATH
programme.desc: The crew heads to their old stomping grounds in Arkansas for a mixture of public land and private land duck hunting, where the boat race is as action-packed as the ducks cupped in the decoys

programme.title: Whitetail Explorer
programme.desc: Mark Beck spot-and-stalked a 200" mule deer earlier in the season, and is now after big whitetails in South Dakota, Illinois and the sleeper state of Oklahoma, where Mark is after a freaky big buck

programme.title: Big Deer TV
programme.desc: All hunters dream of revisiting that special place where it all started. Producer Justin Karnopp returns to his Oregon roots. Aided by familiar faces, he encounters the unexpected

programme.title: Backwoods Life
programme.desc: Justin Moore is hunting in south Georgia at the annual Buck Daze Hunt. This year, he has hit the rut perfectly. Bucks are on their feet chasing does and Justin is in the right place, at the right time

programme.title: Savage Outdoors
programme.desc: Part 2. The guys are still in Illinois hunting at the Grigsby Farm. The big buck activity heats up. Chris and Von Ramsey roll in a few days after Mike has killed his buck. First day out, Chris has a shooter come into his food plot chasing does

programme.title: Reel Time With Florida Sportsman
programme.desc: Captain George Gozdz tries his hand at turkey hunting and fishes the coast of southeast Florida

programme.title: Sweetwater
programme.desc: Kayak fishing for bass

programme.title: Cabela's Instinct
programme.desc: Mark Peterson travels to the southeastern area of Spain to pursue the southern ibex and cap off his cultural experience of the country

programme.title: Small Town Hunting
programme.desc: Muzzleloader season is open in Iowa and that only means one thing: it is time to drop the hammer on the CVA

programme.title: Country Boys Outdoors
programme.desc: Dreams of his first whitetail harvest with a gun on opening day have Brad ready to go as he and his good friend Jerrett Davis arrive at Brad's carefully managed Indiana farm in search of the elusive monster buck

programme.title: Major League Bowhunter
programme.desc: Part 3. After Chipper harvests his Kansas buck, Duff still hopes to fill his archery tag. Duff, while running out of daylight, decides to jump on an unfamiliar farm, and at last light, comes to full draw on a Kansas giant

programme.title: Brotherhood Outdoors
programme.desc: Dale Cullum discusses his role as a business manager for the local insulators union in South Carolina. He shares his history as a mentor and member of the NWTF. During his Michigan turkey hunt, he mentors a lucky youth hunter

programme.title: Extreme Outer Limits TV
programme.desc: A look at Bob's 2015 elk hunt after waiting 16 years to draw the tag

programme.title: Guns & Gear
programme.desc: Hitting the range with the latest releases: Sig Sauer rifles and the XD-E from Springfield Armory. Also: check out the new Founder Series holsters from CrossBreed Holsters, tactical clothing from Propper; Liberty Safe handgun vaults and more

programme.title: Guns & Ammo TV
programme.desc: MagPul introduces the Backpacker X-22. Inland Mfg., a major manufacturer of M1s during WWII, walks the viewers through how it has duplicated the Paratrooper model. Also: a look at options for attaching a suppressor

programme.title: West of Texas
programme.desc: Hunting in the untouched wilderness of Canada's Northwest Territories, Stephen West and friend Gary Sitton are in a man-against-nature situation. The main focus of this hunt is a Dall sheep for Gary

programme.title: Sheep Shape
programme.desc: Patrick Scrogin is prepping for his Wyoming bighorn hunt. Before heading out, he takes a tour of the Gunwerks facility and dials in his rifle for 1,000 yards

programme.title: Fresh Tracks With Randy Newberg
programme.sub-title: New Mexico, Land of Uncooperative Elk
programme.desc: Randy and World Champion Elk Caller, Corey Jacobsen of ELK101.com, cover mile after dusty mile to find cooperative bulls during this hot full-moon archery elk hunt in the hills western New Mexico

programme.title: Long Range Pursuit
programme.desc: Kregg and Garrett team up again to chase big bull elk in the rut

programme.title: Into High Country
programme.desc: Jason pursues his lifelong dream of traveling down to Argentina with good friends to bowhunt free-range red stag during the roar. Follow alongside Jason as he bowhunts the thick, thorn-covered landscape of Argentina in pursuit of a mature red stag bull

programme.title: The Western Hunter
programme.desc: Nate Simmons is bowhunting high-country mule deer in Wyoming's backcountry. After several days of being patient, Nate decides to get aggressive and make a move on a buck he's been watching for days

programme.title: Wild Outdoors *

programme.title: The Lindsey Way
programme.desc: David and Jeff head back to southwest Kansas to hunt the gun opener. David puts the spot-and-stalk on an old whitetail warrior, and Jeff pulls the trigger on another old Kansas whitetail after 20 days of hunting

programme.desc: With Levi's Ohio tag punched already, Samantha finds an old buck that has shown up on the Browning trail cameras and wastes no time devising a plan. Meanwhile, brother and field producer, Micah Morgan, gets a turn in front of the camera

programme.desc: Part 1. Dan and Karl head back to Newfoundland on a spring bear hunt, and they've brought along Cincinnati Bengals' center Russell Bodine. On the first night of his hunt, Russel takes his first bear. Then, Dan puts his .45-70 to work on a Newfie boar

programme.title: Whitetail Fix
programme.desc: Part 1. Matt Bullins heads to south Texas during the pre-rut and experiences a bonafide headscratcher of a hunt

programme.title: Country Boys Outdoors
programme.desc: Dreams of his first whitetail harvest with a gun on opening day have Brad ready to go as he and his good friend Jerrett Davis arrive at Brad's carefully managed Indiana farm in search of the elusive monster buck

programme.title: Spook Nation
programme.desc: Spook chases a buck he calls Praying Hands Buck, while Ohio buddies, Scott and Steve Esker, chase giant whitetail in central Ohio

programme.title: The Fierce Life
programme.desc: Fierce Firearms owner Hugues Vaillancourt is hunting in Africa with Ballentyne Safaris

programme.title: Trijicon's World of Sports Afield
programme.sub-title: Ken Cook - A Life Lived & Remembered
programme.desc: Dave Fulson celebrates the life and loss of his lifetime friendship with professional fisherman Ken Cook. A whitetail hunt on the Cook family's Tarbone Ranch provides the canvas for Fulson as he paints a picture celebrating friendship

programme.title: RNT-V
programme.desc: Journey to the Heaven Hole where Jimbo, Ira and crew talk some into giving up along with getting young dogs, Charlee and Butta, some lessons in honoring

programme.title: Mojo Outdoors TV
programme.desc: Part 2. Terry Denmon heads to the waterfowl-friendly country of Argentina for a week of pure duck hunting paradise. Load'em up because the action never slows. Mojo's close friend, Ramsey Russell, joins in on the action

programme.title: Avian-X TV
programme.desc: The king of all waterfowl, the canvasback, has a majesty and mystique all it's own. Traveling to Lake St. Clair, Fred joins friends, Tim and Jeff, on a quest threatened by mother nature. Destination: the lake's celery beds for limits of canvasback

programme.title: Bill Dance Saltwater
programme.desc: Part 1. Bill teams up with his good fishing buddies Bob Bagby, VP of marketing for Zebco-Quantum brands, and Rich Tudor, co-host of Saltwater Experience, to go for feisty barracudas in the Florida Keys

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: Dolphin fishing offshore

programme.title: Bowlife
programme.desc: With Levi's Ohio tag punched already, Samantha finds an old buck that has shown up on the Browning trail cameras and wastes no time devising a plan. Meanwhile, brother and field producer, Micah Morgan, gets a turn in front of the camera

programme.title: Full Draw Adventures
programme.desc: Ralph and son start off the season with action-packed hunts on opposite sides of the U.S. After an up-close thriller with a Kentucky velvet buck, Ralph travels to the backcountry of Wyoming in search of his first elk

programme.title: Out-There TV
programme.desc: Corey heads to Kansas to chase a buck he has on trail camera that they have coined CPR

programme.title: Wild Outdoors
programme.desc: Last spring, The Wild Outdoors decided to film their turkey hunts live on Facebook. This show highlights the good and bad of that decision

programme.title: McMillan
programme.desc: Part 1. Auction winner Bryan DeWitt joins Tom McMillan and Clint Bowyer on a one-of-a-kind, not-to-be-repeated hog hunt that goes from zero to 100 in a split second

programme.title: The Lindsey Way
programme.desc: David and Jeff head back to southwest Kansas to hunt the gun opener. David puts the spot-and-stalk on an old whitetail warrior, and Jeff pulls the trigger on another old Kansas whitetail after 20 days of hunting

programme.title: Handguns And Defensive Weapons
programme.desc: Scott, Jim and Rich shoot and discuss handguns suitable for home defense and daily carry; Rich and Jim argue the merits of striker-fired pistols vs. 1911s; and Rich demonstrates techniques for managing recoil

programme.title: Gallery of Guns
programme.desc: Professional shooter Travis Tomasie will show the Remington 700 American wilderness rifle in .270. Our staff of experts will review the Glock 20 Gen 4, Colt Gold Cup competition pistol and the Ruger American Ranch Rifle in .450 Bushmaster

programme.title: Huntin' the Backwoods
programme.desc: Part 1. Dan and Karl head back to Newfoundland on a spring bear hunt, and they've brought along Cincinnati Bengals' center Russell Bodine. On the first night of his hunt, Russel takes his first bear. Then, Dan puts his .45-70 to work on a Newfie boar

programme.title: Trained Assassins
programme.desc: Cragg Fitz and Jay Alston head north to the Kingdom Ranch in Missouri to try to fill their second buck tags before the season closes. They still have plenty of bucks on the hit list, and just enough time to try to finish out the season with a bang

programme.title: Red Rising
programme.desc: Chris Ward is taking his son Cole out to hunt in Virginia. Whether they can get it done in their home state, Chris has an ace up his sleeve with an Illinois hunt lined up at Hallowed Ground Outfitters

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: At 86-years-old, Sally Hubbard steals the show by taking her first mule deer

programme.title: Easton Bowhunting TV
programme.desc: Fred and Michele try to finish their world slam on turkeys. Fred with his recurve and Michele with her bow

programme.title: North American Whitetail Television
programme.desc: Dr. James Kroll and Gordon Whittington tag-team Wyoming whitetails on an early-season crossbow hunt; Dr. Deer discusses the growing threat of mountain lion predation; and we examine supplemental water sources

programme.title: Bowhunter TV
programme.desc: Curt Wells returns to the Yukon to hunt moose with well-known outfitter Don Lind of MacMillan River Adventures and together they set out to end Curt's well-documented moose curse

programme.title: The Bucks of Tecomate
programme.desc: David heads to Mississippi and reaps the benefits of biologist Mark Newell's Tecomate Management Plan

programme.title: Cabela's Instinct
programme.desc: Mark Peterson travels to the southeastern area of Spain to pursue the southern ibex and cap off his cultural experience of the country

programme.title: The Gunfather
programme.desc: Lou's wife steps up and makes her presence known in Lou's world. He learns what it means to have a rock star for a partner(n)

programme.title: Guns & Gear
programme.desc: Hitting the range with the latest releases: Sig Sauer rifles and the XD-E from Springfield Armory. Also: check out the new Founder Series holsters from CrossBreed Holsters, tactical clothing from Propper; Liberty Safe handgun vaults and more(n)
